location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Shewing track leading westwards towards Leh, or to Ladis, looking northwards.’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Black and white photograph showing a hill in the centre ground, and sandy ground and the Amir Chah stream in the foreground.Inscriptions:Upper right, above image, in pen: ‘No 3.’Centre, above image, in pen: ‘Low isolated hill partially covered by drifting sand – Hard hippuritic limestone’Left, alongside image, in pen: ‘Lofty drifts of loose sand’Right, alongside image, in pen: ‘sandy desert’ and ‘Amirchah stream’Centre, below image, in pen: ‘Shewing track leading westwards towards Leh, or to Ladis, looking northwards’.
